gui.panels

Class MarkingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.panels.MarkingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MarkingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Class MarkingPanel. Draws the markings of single MarkingLayer over image.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getClosestMarkingPoint

        public java.awt.Point getClosestMarkingPoint(java.awt.Point p,
                                    int distanceParameter)
        Calculates closest Point from coordinatelist to given point. Calculates Manhattan distance.
        Parameters:
        p - Point where coordinatelist Points are compared
        Returns:
        return the closest point from coordinateList if the distance is small enough: @see information.SharedVariables.DISTANCE_TO_REMOVE.
